artist: Engraver: John Taylor Wedgwood; Painter: After Anthony van Dyck
description: portrait of Gaspar de Crayer facing right looking at viewer; bust length
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [ Painted by Vandyke/ Gaspar de crayer/ Engraved by John T. Wedgwood/ London Pub. for the Proprietor, September 1822/ (monogram) Proof];  on sheet in pencil: [1-320]
title: Portrait of Gaspar de Crayer
